courseSectionInformation: 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: ACE 222 or FIN 300 or equivalent.
description: Development of futures trading; operation and governance of commodity exchanges; economic functions of futures trading; operational procedures and problems in using futures markets; public regulation of futures trading; evaluation of market performance. 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: ACE 222 or FIN 300 or equivalent.
label: Commodity Futures and Options
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Agri-Accounting or Agri-Finance or Farm Management or Agribusiness Markets & Mgmt or Consumer Economics & Finance or Envirnmntal Economics & Policy or Policy, Intl Trade, & Dvlpmt or Public Policy and Law or Financial Planning or Finance in Agri-Business or Food & Agribusiness Management major(s) or minor(s).
